ogTitle: *new information*: missing children & covid-19 - smarther news
ogDescription: what we learned from the head of the u.s. marshals missing child unit on their latest investigations. plus ~ fresh clarity from the cdc about the recent statistics on covid-19 deaths and what to know about rapid covid-19 testing coming to your state.
summary: What we learned from the head of the U.S. Marshals Missing Child Unit on their latest investigations. Plus ~ fresh clarity from the CDC about the recent statistics on COVID-19 deaths and what to know about rapid COVID-19 testing coming to your state.
